items.title: Trump tariff threat over Greenland 'unacceptable', European leaders say
items.title_zh: 欧洲领导人表示,
items.summary: A threat by President Donald Trump to impose fresh tariffs on eight allies opposed to his proposed takeover of Greenland has drawn condemnation from European leaders.
items.summary_zh: 总统唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)威胁对反对他提议接管格陵兰的八个盟国征收新关税,这引起了欧洲领导人的谴责.

items.title: US judge restricts ICE response to Minneapolis protesters
items.title_zh: 美国法官限制ICE对明尼阿波利斯抗议者的回应
items.summary: A US federal judge has issued an order limiting the crowd control tactics that can be used by Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents (ICE) towards "peaceful and unobstructive" protesters in Minneapolis.
items.summary_zh: 一名美国联邦法官发布命令,限制移民和海关执法人员(ICE)对明尼阿波利斯“和平无阻”抗议者采用的人群控制策略。

items.title: Iran supreme leader acknowledges thousands killed during recent protests
items.title_zh: 伊朗最高领导人承认数千人在最近的抗议中丧生。
items.summary: Iran's supreme leader has for the first time publicly acknowledged that thousands of people were killed during recent protests.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗最高领导人首次公开承认,在最近的抗议中,数千人被杀害。

items.title: 月探査 アルテミス計画のロケットが発射台へ 宇宙飛行士が会見

items.title: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
items.title_zh: 81岁领导人的第七次任期对乌干达意味着什么?
items.summary: For supporters of Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni, his resounding victory in the just-concluded election is a vindication of his 40-year-long rule.
items.summary_zh: 对于乌干达总统约韦里·穆塞韦尼的支持者来说,他在刚刚结束的选举中的彻底胜利证明了他长达40年的统治。

items.title: 愛知 豊田の集合住宅火災 死亡女性は殺害されたか 警察が捜査
items.title_zh: 住火的丰田爱知被害妇女或警方调查

items.title: Avalanches kill five off-piste skiers in Austrian Alps
items.title_zh: 奥地利阿尔卑斯山有5名滑雪运动员被雪崩
items.summary: Five off-piste skiers have died in two avalanches in the Austria's Alps following heavy snowfall in the region.
items.summary_zh: 该地区降下大雪后,5名脱落滑雪运动员在奥地利阿尔卑斯山脉的两次雪崩中丧生.

items.title: Who is on Trump's 'Board of Peace' overseeing Gaza's reconstruction?
items.title_zh: 谁在特朗普的"和平理事会"监督加沙的重建?
items.summary: The White House has released the names of the members who will be part of the senior executive working with his new "Board of Peace" for Gaza.
items.summary_zh: 白宫公布将加入高级行政人员的人选,

items.title: Ugandan leader extends 40-year rule after winning contested poll
items.title_zh: 在赢得有争议的民意测验后,乌干达领导人延长了40年的统治期
items.summary: Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni has been declared the winner of Thursday's election extending his four decades in power by another five years.
items.summary_zh: 乌干达总统约韦里·穆塞韦尼被宣布为星期四选举的获胜者,他的任期又延长了五年。

items.title: From camouflage to tracksuits - Guinea's junta leader becomes civilian president
items.title_zh: 从伪装到履履历 - 几内亚军政府领导人成为文职总统.
items.summary: From the moment he seized power in September 2021 Guinea's Mamadi Doumbouya struck an imposing figure.
items.summary_zh: 从他于2021年9月夺权起,几内亚的马马迪·杜姆布亚就大打出人意料。

items.title: Big names on Trump's peace panel face huge challenges in Gaza
items.title_zh: 特朗普和平小组的大人物在加沙面临巨大挑战
items.summary: The White House has announced the first members of its Gaza "Board of Peace", and the list of names will do little to dispel the criticism from some quarters that the US president's plan resembles, at its heart, a colonial solution imposed over the heads of the Palestinians.
items.summary_zh: 白宫已宣布其加沙首批成员为"和平理事会", 名单对消除某些人士的批评作用不大,

items.title: Syrian army moves east of Aleppo after Kurdish forces withdraw
items.title_zh: 叙利亚军队在库尔德军队撤出后向阿勒颇以东移动
items.summary: The Syrian army is moving into areas east of Aleppo city, after Kurdish forces started a withdrawal.
items.summary_zh: 在库尔德部队开始撤退后,叙利亚军队正向阿勒颇市以东地区移动.

items.title: Japanese mayor apologises after calling staff 'human scum'
items.title_zh: 日本市长在称工作人员为“人渣”后道歉
items.summary: The mayor of Yokohama has apologised for insulting colleagues after an official publicly accused him of making offensive remarks.
items.summary_zh: 横滨市长在一名官员公开指责他发表冒犯性言论后,对侮辱同事的行为表示歉意.

items.title: Watch: Armed group robs Pokémon store in New York City
items.title_zh: 观察:武装组织抢劫纽约市的Pokémon商店
items.summary: New York City police are searching for multiple suspects after a masked group stole Pokémon merchandise at a Manhattan store on Wednesday, 14 January.
items.summary_zh: 1月14日星期三,一个蒙面团伙在曼哈顿一家商店盗窃了Pokémon商品,纽约市警方正在搜寻多名嫌疑人。

items.title: Google appeals landmark antitrust verdict over search monopoly
items.title_zh: Google 对具有里程碑意义的反托拉斯判决的上诉 相对于搜索垄断
items.summary: Google has appealed a US district judge's landmark antitrust ruling that found the company illegally held a monopoly in online search.
items.summary_zh: Google已就美国地区法官的标志性反托拉斯裁决提出上诉,该裁决认定该公司在网络搜索中非法垄断.

items.title: A faceless hacker stole my therapy notes – now my deepest secrets are online forever
items.title_zh: 一个没脸的黑客偷了我的治疗笔记,
items.summary: As soon as Meri-Tuuli Auer saw the subject line in her junk folder, she knew it was no ordinary spam email. It contained her full name and her social security number - the unique code Finnish people use to access public services and banking.
items.summary_zh: 当Meri-Tuuli Auer在她的垃圾文件夹中看到主题线时,她就知道这不是普通的垃圾邮件. 里面有她的全名和她的社会保障号码——芬兰人使用的独特代码来获取公共服务和银行业务.

items.title: The mysterious singer with millions of streams - but who (or what) is she?
items.title_zh: 神秘的歌手,
items.summary: Sienna Rose is having a good month.
items.summary_zh: 西耶纳 罗斯有一个好月。

items.title: Trump's proposed credit card cap spotlights Americans' debt. Would it help?
items.title_zh: 特朗普提出的信用卡封顶将美国债务聚焦. 有用吗?
items.summary: Credit card debt is an increasingly heavy burden for millions of Americans.
items.summary_zh: 信用卡债务是数百万美国人日益沉重的负担.

items.title: Under fire from the sea, families in Odesa try to escape Russian barrage
items.title_zh: 在大海的火力下,奥德萨的家属试图逃离俄国的炮火
items.summary: From Mariia's 16th-floor flat, the calm waters of the Black Sea stretch out into the horizon beneath the fading twilight.
items.summary_zh: 从马里亚的16层平面上, 黑海的平静的海水伸展到渐渐衰落的暮光下

items.title: Paracetamol is safe in pregnancy, says study refuting Trump autism claims
items.title_zh: Paracetamol在怀孕时很安全,
items.summary: Taking paracetamol while pregnant is safe and there's no evidence it raises the risk of autism, ADHD and developmental issues in children, say experts behind a major new review.
items.summary_zh: 在怀孕安全的情况下服用镇静剂 没有任何证据 会引起自闭症、ADHD 以及儿童发育问题

items.title: A hotline to report vapers and caning if you're caught: Singapore's e-cigarette crackdown
items.title_zh: 新加坡电子香烟镇压事件
items.summary: It's a busy day at Woodlands Checkpoint, Singapore's main land crossing on the border with Malaysia, and thousands of cars are slowly trundling past the watchful eyes of customs officer Belinda Liaw and her team.
items.summary_zh: 在新加坡与马来西亚交界的主要陆地口岸伍德兰检查站,

items.title: 'Anger and frustration': BBC reports from Iranian-Armenian border
items.title_zh: “愤怒与沮丧”:BBC伊朗-亚美尼亚边境的报道
items.summary: For over two weeks, demonstrations rocked Iran and, according to a human rights group, more than 2,600 protesters have been killed.
items.summary_zh: 两周多来,示威活动震撼伊朗,据一个人权团体称,已有2 600多名抗议者丧生。

items.title: Why is there so much international interest in Greenland?
items.title_zh: 为什么国际上对格陵兰如此感兴趣?
items.summary: Greenland, a sparsely populated but resource-rich island, is at the heart of a growing diplomatic dispute between Denmark and the US - but why?
items.summary_zh: 格陵兰是一个人口稀少但资源丰富的岛屿,是丹麦和美国日益严重的外交争端的核心,但为什么?

items.title: Canada's deal with China signals it is serious about shift from US
items.title_zh: 加拿大对中国的处理表明,它很重视从美国转移出去
items.summary: Prime Minister Mark Carney's new approach to Canada's foreign policy can perhaps be distilled in one line: "We take the world as it is, not as we wish it to be."
items.summary_zh: 马克·卡尼总理对加拿大外交政策的新方针也许可以一行提炼:"我们把世界看成现实,而不是我们希望的世界".

items.title: Machado vows to lead Venezuela 'when right time comes'
items.title_zh: Machado发誓在适当时机来临时领导委内瑞拉。
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has vowed she will lead the country "when the right time comes".
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多(María Corina Machado)曾发誓,"在适当时机来临时"她将领导国家.

items.title: South African national park closed due to floods
items.title_zh: 南非国家公园因洪水而关闭
items.summary: Ongoing floods in the north-eastern provinces of South Africa have led to the closure of the world-famous Kruger National Park. Hundreds of staff and visitors were evacuated on Thursday.
items.summary_zh: 南非东北部各省不断发生水灾,导致世界著名的克鲁格国家公园关闭。 星期四有数百名工作人员和游客撤离。

items.title: Myanmar begins defence in landmark genocide case at UN court
items.title_zh: 缅甸开始在联合国法庭对具有里程碑意义的种族灭绝案件进行辩护
items.summary: Myanmar has denied committing genocide against the Ronhingya people, saying The Gambia has failed to provide enough proof, as it begun its defence at the UN's top court.
items.summary_zh: 缅甸否认对龙兴亚人犯下灭绝种族罪, 表示冈比亚未能提供足够的证据,

items.title: Who is Reza Pahlavi, the son of Iran's last shah?
items.title_zh: 伊朗最后一任沙赫之子雷扎·帕哈维是谁?
items.summary: 65-year-old Reza Pahlavi, the exiled son of Iran's last shah has been a prominent voice calling for protests to continue in the country.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗最后一任沙赫的流亡之子、65岁的雷扎·帕哈拉维,

items.title: CIA director had two-hour meeting with new Venezuelan leader in Caracas
items.title_zh: 中央情报局主任在加拉加斯与委内瑞拉新领导人举行了两小时的会议
items.summary: CIA director John Ratcliffe met Venezuela's Interim President Delcy Rodríguez in Caracas on Thursday "at President Trump's direction," a US official has said.
items.summary_zh: 中央情报局主任约翰·拉特克利夫星期四在加拉加斯会见了委内瑞拉临时总统德尔西·罗德里格斯,"在特朗普总统的指示下",一位美国官员说.

items.title: China and Canada announce tariffs relief after a high-stakes meeting between Carney and Xi
items.title_zh: 中国和加拿大在卡尼和习近平举行高层会谈后宣布减免关税
items.summary: Chinese leader Xi Jinping and Canadian PM Mark Carney have announced lower tariffs, signalling a reset in their countries' relationship after a key meeting in Beijing.
items.summary_zh: 中国领导人习近平和加拿大总理马克·卡尼宣布降低关税,表示在北京举行重要会议后两国关系重设.

items.title: 'I was hit in the face by pellets': Iranians on border describe violence and more protests
items.title_zh: "我被子弹击中脸部": 伊朗边境人士描述暴力和更多抗议活动。
items.summary: At the border crossing from Iran into Iraqi Kurdistan, the stern face of Iran's former supreme leader, Ayatollah Khomeini, peers down at the trickle of Iranians leaving the territory.
items.summary_zh: 在从伊朗进入伊拉克库尔德斯坦的边境口岸,伊朗前最高领导人阿亚图拉·霍梅尼的严酷面孔,在伊朗人离开该领土的微风下游。

items.title: US accuses South Africa military of 'cosying up to Iran'
items.title_zh: 美国指责南非军方「与伊朗为敌」。
items.summary: The US has accused South Africa's defence ministry of refusing to obey orders from its own government to send home Iranian warships that have been conducting naval exercises in the African country's waters.
items.summary_zh: 美国指责南非国防部拒绝服从本国政府的命令,将一直在非洲国家水域进行海军演习的伊朗军舰送回家.

items.title: Israel moves Yellow Line deeper into Gaza, satellite images show
items.title_zh: 以色列将黄线深入加沙,卫星图像显示
items.summary: Israel has moved the blocks which are supposed to mark its post-ceasefire line of control deeper into Gaza in several places, sowing confusion among Palestinians.
items.summary_zh: 以色列已把本应标有停火后控制线的路障移到加沙若干地方,在巴勒斯坦人中间制造混乱。
